import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Formulaire } from '../models/formulaire'; import { FormPortService } from '../form-port.service'; import * as Aos from 'aos'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills', templateUrl: './skills.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills.component.css'] }) export class SkillsComponent { @Input() personne: Formulaire[] = []; constructor( private formPort: FormPortService ) { } ngOnInit() { Aos.init(); } }
